jd: Role : SENIOR DATASTAX/CASSANDRA DBA100% ON-SITE LONG-TERM SENIOR DATASTAX/CASSANDRA DBA CONTRACT ROLE IN NORTH CHICAGO, ILONLY CANDIDATES LOCAL TO ILLINOIS OR WISCONSIN!!!Visa : GC, USC12+ years of experience in IT5+ years of experience in DataStax/Cassandra is a MUST!2 MS Teams Interviews (1 interview may be on site, that’s why we need local candidates!)EXCELLENT VERBAL AND WRITTEN COMMUNICATION SKILLS!!!DATASTAX/CASSANDRA DBA POSITION’S QUALIFICATIONS:• Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology or related field.• 12+ years of experience in IT• 5+ years of experience in Database Management/Data Integration.• Proficient in one or more Database Management Systems (e.g. DB2i, DB2 LUW, DataStax, Oracle, SQL Server).• Familiar with one or more replication technologies (e.g. DTShare, CDC, SQL Replication, Attunity).• Ability to read a Logical Data Model a plus.• Excellent verbal and written communication skills.• Detail oriented. Can juggle multiple priorities.• Strong analytical, problem-solving ability.• May require travel to branch locations.• Regular and reliable attendance.• Certifications are a PLUS.
